Summary Note:
The RM first met Durand Robert Garcia at a wine tasting event in Paris. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Durand Robert Garcia is a 57 year old Family Office Executive from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Durand Robert Garcia is currently widowed. His child is named Louna.
Education Background:
Durand obtained his secondary school diploma from Lycée Polyvalent François Mauriac in 1985.
Durand finished his studies at EMIC de Paris in 1990.
Occupation History:
Durand Robert Garcia is a seasoned professional with over 33 years of experience.
In 1992, Durand Robert Garcia started working as a Financial Advisor at La Banque Postale Private Banking, marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Société Générale Private Banking as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1997 to 2001.
In 2002, he joined Société Générale Private Banking as a Wealth Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
After 12 years of dedication, he assumed the role of Family Office Executive at BNP Paribas Wealth Management in 2006, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1160000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has house located in Limoges, worth 1780000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Paris worth 3270000 EUR.

In 2008, he received an inheritance of 660000 EUR from his late father, who was a prominent Oil and Gas Executive, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
